text: Ba kasone, ki ʙa on ci Alloh az fazli xeş ʙa onon dodaast, ʙuxl mevarzand, gumon naʙarand, ki on ʙuxl ʙaroi onon ʙehtarast, ʙalki ʙa zijoni onhost. Va dar rūzi qijomat, cize ki dar on ʙuxl varzidaand, saʙaʙi azoʙaşon megardad va ʙaroi Alloh ast hamai doroihoi osmon va zamin. Pas nafaqa kuned az on ci ki Alloh rūziaton dod, zero ʙozgaşti hama umur ʙa sūi Alloh ast va ʙaroi rūzi oxirati xud xajrxohī kuned, ki naf'i on, rūzi qijomat ʙa şumo merasad va Alloh ʙa on ci mekuned ogoh ast
